title: Exquisite Kundan and Gemstone Chandbali Earrings - A Timeless Statement
features: Classic Chandbali design with a crescent moon shape adorned with uncut Polki diamonds in a traditional Kundan setting. Features a central square-cut Emerald and a teardrop Emerald, complemented by cascading Ruby drops and delicate pearl accents. Exquisite filigree work surrounds the gemstones, adding a touch of antique charm. The top of the Chandbali displays a floral ruby design, enhanced by surrounding polkis.
colors: White (Pearls). A vibrant and auspicious color combination typical of South Indian bridal jewelry.
description: This Chandbali earring embodies the opulence of traditional South Indian jewelry. The use of uncut Polki diamonds gives it a unique, regal aesthetic. The vibrant Ruby and Emerald gemstones are meticulously selected for their color and clarity. Handcrafted by skilled artisans in Hyderabad, this piece is a testament to enduring craftsmanship and timeless elegance. The Hyderabadi polish provides a lasting luster. This earring is a heritage piece that can be passed down through generations.
